data.name: 8Base
data.comment: Possible copycat or subgroup of RansomHouse group.The extension is also used as RAAS by Phobos

data.name: Archiveus
data.comment: The Archiveus Trojan was the first ever ransomware strand to use RSA encryption

data.name: Bitpaymer
data.comment: BitPaymer adds its file extension to the encrypted files � �.<company_name>�, alongside a ransom note with the same file name and - �.<company_name>_readme� extension.

data.name: Conti
data.comment: A series of five letters is used as an extension, given the leaked source code used by Monti

data.name: CryptoWall
data.comment: Successor of Cryptolocker

data.name: Dharma
data.comment: CrySiS  > Dharma > AI SARA

data.name: PayOrGrief
data.comment: Grief was recently rebranded from DoppelPaymer ransomware. A ransom note is written on the lock screen on a blue background:(Grief)

data.name: PrideLocker
data.comment: variants based on Babuk source code

data.name: GoldenEye
data.comment: Not a wiper in all the cases

data.name: Gwisinlocker
data.comment: the ransomware have also some cases where changes the extension name to the name of the targeted company

data.name: Hades
data.comment: Moving to lockbit RAAS program

data.name: Jigsaw
data.comment: Hardcoded password used for the encryption. The ransom note is displayed on the screen

data.name: Lockbit
data.comment: ABCD ransomware > Lockbit

data.name: bl00dy
data.comment: Reuse the leaks of LockBit, Babuk, Conti source code rather than developing their own software

data.name: Maze
data.comment: Maze  >  Sekhmet >  Egregor

data.name: Rorschach
data.comment: Based on the babuk source code

data.name: Royal
data.comment: Now rebanded in BlackSuit ransomware group

data.name: Ryuk
data.comment: Ryuk adds a marker in the encrypted files using the keyword �HERMES�.

data.name: PolyVice
data.comment: Overloop code with Chily and SunnyDay ransomware

data.name: Jarjets
data.comment: Rebrand of Cylance ransomware

data.name: BlackShadow
data.comment: Rebrand of Jarjets ransomware (Cylance > Jarjets > BlackShadow)

data.name: Cheerscrypt
data.comment: Based on the Babuk source-code leaks we have seen over 2021. Lockfile > AtomSilo > Rook > Pandora > NightSky > Cheerscrypt

data.name: Hunters International
data.comment: Rebrand of Hive ransomware

data.name: Rhysida
data.comment: Rebrand of HelloKitty ransomware

data.name: Akira
data.comment: Rebrand of Conti group

data.name: Zombi
data.comment: Forked stain from MedusaLocker

data.name: BlackLegion
data.comment: Rename of BlackDream ?

data.name: BlackDream
data.comment: BlackHeart > BlackRouter > BlackDream

data.name: BlackRouter
data.comment: BlackHeart > BlackRouter

data.name: MarioLocker
data.comment: Possible affliation with RansomHouse group. The files are hosted in gofile.io (ransom + payloads)

data.name: 0kilobypt
notes: WHERE ARE YOUR FILES READ ME.txt

data.name: 16x
comment: Note:Ransom note printed in the cmd that launch ed by the payload of the ransomware

data.name: Hornet
data.comment: Take as ransom extenion the base64 of the name of file

data.name: Agenda
data.comment: Extension based on ten random letters (up and downcase) used as id victim company

data.name: BlackSuit
data.comment: royal > blacksuit

data.name: Egregor
data.comment: Maze  >  Sekhmet >  Egregor

data.name: HadesLocker
data.comment: Hades Locker is based on the WildFire Locker.

data.name: LockFile
data.comment: Based on the Babuk source-code leaks we have seen over 2021. Lockfile > AtomSilo > Rook > Pandora > NightSky > Cheerscrypt

data.name: Mespinoza
data.comment: Vurten > Mespinoza > Pysa

data.name: NightSky
data.comment: Based on the Babuk source-code leaks we have seen over 2021. Lockfile > AtomSilo > Rook > Pandora > NightSky > Cheerscrypt

data.name: Pandora
data.comment: Pandora is a re-brand of ROOK Based on the Babuk source-code leaks we have seen over 2021. Lockfile > AtomSilo > Rook > Pandora > NightSky > Cheerscrypt

data.name: RagnarLocker
data.comment: Dev of ransomware was arrested in Paris, France, on 16 October, and his home in Czechia was searched. Ukrainian police raided the premises of another suspected gang members in Kyiv, seizing laptops, mobile phones, and electronic devices

data.name: Rook
data.comment: Based on the Babuk source-code leaks we have seen over 2021. Lockfile > AtomSilo > Rook > Pandora > NightSky > Cheerscrypt

data.name: Atomsilo
data.comment: Based on the Babuk source-code leaks we have seen over 2021. Lockfile > AtomSilo > Rook > Pandora > NightSky > Cheerscrypt
